patch.description: Complete apply_patch payload. Must include '*** Begin Patch'/'*** End Patch' sentinels plus one or more actions: '*** Update File', '*** Add File', or '*** Delete File'. Updates contain @@ chunks with +/- lines exactly as they appear in the file. Adds must prefix every line with '+'. Always READ files first and copy the original text verbatim into '-' lines. The tool validates the entire patch before applying and reports precise errors when context or files do not match.
